temper-blade.name: Temper Blade

special: Target weapon gains +1D6 damage for 1 combat
Can be applied to any bladed weapon
Does not stack

temper-blade.description: Heat and work a weapon's edge through magical means, sharpening it beyond its normal capacity. The metal glows briefly before settling into a keener form.

basic-weapon-armor-repair.name: Basic Weapon and Armor Repair

special: Repair target weapon or armor piece
Requires materials equal to item's quality
Caster skips next round to finish repairs
Item heals 2D10 HP

basic-weapon-armor-repair.description: Take the time to repair a broken weapon or piece of armor, ensuring it shines and is sharpened to how it was when first pulled from the fire.

reinforce-weapon.name: Reinforce Weapon

special: Target weapon gains +10 HP for 1 hour
If weapon would break, loses bonus HP first

reinforce-weapon.description: Channel craft magic into a weapon's structure, binding its materials more tightly together. Cracks seal, warps straighten.

quick-strike-craft.name: Quick Strike

special: Can be used with any held weapon
Weapon trails faint light as it moves

quick-strike-craft.description: Infuse a weapon with kinetic energy as you swing, adding magical force to the physical blow.

weapon-bond-craft.name: Weapon Bond

special: Always know weapon's location within 100 ft.
Can recall to hand as 1 AP action within 30 ft.
Additional +10 ft. per extra 1 AP spent

weapon-bond-craft.description: Form a magical connection between yourself and a weapon. The bond allows you to sense its location and recall it to your hand.

shatter-guard.name: Shatter Guard

special: Target weapon, shield, or armor
If item drops below half HP, gains Broken condition (damage halved) until repaired

shatter-guard.description: Strike a weapon or shield with precise magical force, targeting the weak points in its construction.

forge-blade.name: Forge Blade

special: Create mundane weapon of any type you have previously handled
Weapon has standard stats
Lasts 1 hour or until dismissed
Requires appropriate raw materials

forge-blade.description: Using available materials and craft magic, conjure a functional weapon from raw components. The weapon is temporary but fully effective.

devastating-edge.name: Devastating Edge

special: Target weapon gains +2D8 damage
Ignores 2 points of damage reduction
Critical hits cause Bleeding

devastating-edge.description: Enchant a weapon with destructive potential, causing it to cleave through defenses and flesh alike with supernatural efficacy.

masterwork-weapon.name: Masterwork Weapon

special: Permanently enhance a weapon
+2D10 damage
Weapon HP doubled
Choose one property: Returning, Balanced (+5 ft. range), Keen (+2 D20 vs targets below half HP), or Durable (self-repairs 1 HP/hour)
Requires 1 hour of uninterrupted work and quality materials

masterwork-weapon.description: Pour your craft expertise into creating or enhancing a weapon to legendary quality. The process is demanding but produces results that rival artifacts.

tool-mastery.name: Tool Mastery
tool-mastery.description: Attune yourself to a set of tools, understanding their purpose at a fundamental level. Your hands move with practiced ease.

improvise.name: Improvise

special: Use any object as tool for unintended purpose with no penalty
Improvised tools function as standard tools for 10 minutes

improvise.description: See the potential in mundane objects. A belt becomes a tourniquet, a fork becomes a lockpick, a chair leg becomes a weapon.

mending-touch-craft.name: Mending Touch

special: Repair object for 2D10 HP
Cannot restore destroyed items or magical properties
Works on weapons, armor, tools, mundane objects

mending-touch-craft.description: Channel craft magic into a broken or damaged object, coaxing its pieces back together. Small repairs happen almost instantly.

tool-enhancement.name: Tool Enhancement

special: If used as improvised weapon, deals +1D6 damage

tool-enhancement.description: Imbue a set of tools with magical precision. Blades cut cleaner, picks feel for tumblers, needles find their mark with uncanny accuracy.

deconstruct.name: Deconstruct

special: Automatically succeed on skill check to disable/unlock/disassemble non-magical mechanism Diff 40 or lower
Higher difficulties gain +2 D20 bonus instead

deconstruct.description: Analyze an object's construction and identify its weaknesses. With a touch, you can unravel locks, disable mechanisms, or understand how to bypass obstacles.

crafters-insight.name: Crafter's Insight

special: All attacks against armored targets deal +2D6 damage
25% chance to reduce target's armor effectiveness by 1 point permanently (max -3)

crafters-insight.description: Your understanding of construction reveals structural weaknesses in everything around you, including your enemies' armor and weapons.

perfect-repair.name: Perfect Repair

special: Fully restore item to maximum HP
Remove Broken condition
If destroyed within last hour, restore to half HP instead

perfect-repair.description: Channel significant craft magic into a damaged item, restoring it completely. Even items on the verge of destruction can be salvaged.

minor-enchant.name: Minor Enchant

special: Enchant an object with a single minor magical property
Examples: glow softly, resist temperature, stay clean
Duration: 1 hour

minor-enchant.description: Imbue an object with a small magical effect. The enchantment is temporary but useful.

greater-enchant.name: Greater Enchant
greater-enchant.duration: 1 hour for 2 properties or 8 hours for 1

special: Enchant an object with magical properties
Duration depends on number of properties applied

greater-enchant.description: Enchant an object with magical properties. Duration depends on the number of properties applied.
